title: Automatic Topic Detection for Research Papers
abstract: We propose an automatic method for detecting research topics from paper abstracts using TF-IDF and clustering. Experiments show coherent topic groups across computer science subfields.

title: Neural Models for Scientific Document Classification
abstract: This paper explores neural network architectures applied to scientific document classification and compares them with classical bag-of-words baselines.

title: Survey on Topic Modeling Techniques
abstract: A comprehensive survey of topic modeling techniques including LDA, NMF and modern transformer-based approaches with evaluation metrics.

title: Biomedical Literature Topic Discovery
abstract: We apply topic modeling to biomedical literature to identify emerging themes in genomics and clinical research using domain-specific preprocessing.

title: Citation-aware Topic Summarization
abstract: Introduce a citation-aware summarization that leverages citation contexts to improve topic summaries and highlight influential works.

title: Cross-lingual Topic Identification
abstract: Techniques for identifying topics across languages using multilingual embeddings and transfer learning are evaluated on parallel corpora.

title: Interactive Visualizations for Topic Exploration
abstract: We present an interactive visualization tool that helps researchers explore discovered topics and related documents in large paper collections.

title: Mining Trends from Conference Proceedings
abstract: Temporal topic modeling applied to conference proceedings to analyze emerging trends and shifts in research focus over time.

title: Clustering Research Papers with TF-IDF and KMeans
abstract: A practical guide to clustering research papers using TF-IDF features and KMeans, including evaluation and hyperparameter tuning.

title: Evaluating Topic Coherence Metrics
abstract: This study compares different topic coherence metrics and their correlation with human judgments on scientific corpora.

title: Domain Adaptation for Topic Models
abstract: We investigate domain adaptation strategies to transfer topic models trained on one scientific domain to another with minimal labeled data.

title: Automated Survey Generation from Topics
abstract: Method for generating brief surveys of a field by automatically selecting representative papers per topic and synthesizing summaries.

title: Short-Text Topic Modeling for Paper Titles
abstract: Approaches for discovering topics from short-text inputs like titles using enriched context and external knowledge bases.

title: Keyword Extraction to Aid Topic Discovery
abstract: This paper studies keyword extraction algorithms and how extracted keywords improve downstream topic discovery tasks.

title: Scaling Topic Discovery to Million-Document Corpora
abstract: Engineering techniques and approximation methods to scale topic discovery pipelines to millions of documents with constrained memory.
